title: Build heartbeat integration for shared queue
description: Create a script that runs on cron (every 5 min) to: 1) Pull latest from shared queue repo, 2) Check for tasks assigned to this agent, 3) Log task count to a status file, 4) Push any local changes. Should be a standalone Python script we can both use. Commit to agent-shared-queue repo under /scripts/heartbeat_sync.py
